from_account_id: The from account id field is required.
The from account id must be an integer.
to_account_id: The to account id field is required.
The to account id must be an integer.
The to account id and from account id must be different.
amount: The amount must be a number.
The amount must be greater than 0.
description: The description must be a string.
The description may not be greater than 255 characters.
